text: Arau yadi tomaloke sihamta ubhayara majata biraodha asanka karaa tente tomaloke sbamira paraiyalara paraa ejana arau straira paraiyalara paraa ejana bicaraka niyukta karaa; sihamta ubhaye yadi nispatti bicarae tente allahe sihamtara majata mimansara anukula arastha srsti karai diba. Niscaya allaha sarbajna, sabisesa arahita
